project.name: Sample Project
project.description: A sample issues file demonstrating the expected format for import-issues script

issues.title: Initialize project repository and structure
issues.body:
## Description

Set up the initial project structure with appropriate tooling and configuration.

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] Repository initialized with .gitignore
- [ ] Package manager configured
- [ ] Linting and formatting configured
- [ ] Basic folder structure created
- [ ] README with setup instructions

## Technical Notes

- Follow the project's chosen framework conventions
- Include common dev dependencies

issues.title: Configure CI/CD pipeline
issues.body:
## Description

Set up continuous integration and deployment workflows.

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] Build workflow runs on push/PR
- [ ] Tests run automatically
- [ ] Linting checks pass
- [ ] Deploy to staging on main branch

## Technical Notes

- Use GitHub Actions
- Cache dependencies for faster builds

## Dependencies

- Depends on: Project setup (#1)

issues.title: Design database schema
issues.body:
## Description

Design and document the initial database schema for core entities.

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] Entity relationship diagram created
- [ ] Schema migrations written
- [ ] Seed data for development
- [ ] Documentation in ADR format

## Technical Notes

- Consider future scalability
- Add appropriate indexes

issues.title: Implement user authentication
issues.body:
## Description

Create user authentication system with login, registration, and session management.

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] User registration with email/password
- [ ] User login with session management
- [ ] Password reset functionality
- [ ] Input validation and error handling
- [ ] Security best practices followed

## Technical Notes

- Use bcrypt for password hashing
- Implement rate limiting on auth endpoints
- Follow OWASP authentication guidelines

## Dependencies

- Depends on: Database schema (#3)

issues.title: Create dashboard UI
issues.body:
## Description

Build the main dashboard interface for authenticated users.

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] Responsive layout (mobile, tablet, desktop)
- [ ] Navigation component
- [ ] Data visualization widgets
- [ ] Loading states and error handling
- [ ] Accessibility compliance (WCAG 2.1 AA)

## Technical Notes

- Use component library for consistency
- Implement skeleton loading states

## Dependencies

- Depends on: User authentication (#4)

issues.title: Add API rate limiting and caching
issues.body:
## Description

Implement rate limiting and caching for API performance and security.

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] Rate limiting on all public endpoints
- [ ] Response caching where appropriate
- [ ] Cache invalidation strategy
- [ ] Monitoring and alerting

## Technical Notes

- Consider Redis for caching
- Document rate limits in API docs

issues.title: Write comprehensive test suite
issues.body:
## Description

Ensure adequate test coverage for all critical paths.

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] Unit tests for business logic (>80% coverage)
- [ ] Integration tests for API endpoints
- [ ] E2E tests for critical user flows
- [ ] Test documentation

## Technical Notes

- Use testing framework appropriate for stack
- Include both happy path and edge cases

issues.title: Performance optimization
issues.body:
## Description

Optimize application performance based on profiling results.

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] Lighthouse score > 90
- [ ] API response times < 200ms (p95)
- [ ] Bundle size optimized
- [ ] Database queries optimized

## Technical Notes

- Profile before optimizing
- Document performance benchmarks

issues.title: Security audit and hardening
issues.body:
## Description

Conduct security review and implement hardening measures.

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] OWASP Top 10 review completed
- [ ] Dependency vulnerabilities addressed
- [ ] Security headers configured
- [ ] Penetration testing (if applicable)
- [ ] Security documentation updated

## Technical Notes

- Use automated scanning tools
- Document security measures in SECURITY.md

issues.title: Prepare production deployment
issues.body:
## Description

Finalize deployment configuration and documentation.

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] Production environment configured
- [ ] Environment variables documented
- [ ] Deployment runbook created
- [ ] Rollback procedure documented
- [ ] Monitoring and alerting set up

## Technical Notes

- Use infrastructure as code where possible
- Include disaster recovery plan
